title: The Beginning
content: The Merestack journey began in 1995 when two college friends, John Salivan and Kris Klopperman got together and started selling computers and engineering calculators.

title: Mission
content: At Mergestack, we’re on a mission to bring together the personal service of local IT providers with the power of a national network. We believe that’s simpler than it sounds. Our offices offer high-touch IT services that clients love from highly experienced local team members.

title: We are global
content: Our national network allows us to offer best-in-class services like dedicated vCIOs, specialized security and compliance advisory services, a 24/7 help desk, and more.
